name: First Class
description:
Welcome to First Class!

Controls:

  • Mouse

Instructions:

  • Click an airplane to access its risk meter - increase or decrease the pilots awareness of their surroundings.
  • Click on a storm icon to change which storm is active - click anywhere on screen to place a storm.
  • Use storms to safely guide airplanes to their destination.
  • Get airplanes to their destination as quickly as possible to earn a greater number of points.
  • When 3 collisions occur its game over.
